title: Google Variant
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am using the google variant AND the google play store is present on the device

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I click on "Buy MLB" in the drawer
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should be directed to a purchase page that displays google play store options

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the correct store or alternative for the variant is available

AND I click on "Buy" on the purchase page
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should start the purchase process using the variant-specific store

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I am not entitled to audio content
AND I launch the app and select the Audio link on the Scoreboard
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I will see a paywall with the options to buy MLB Audio

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I am not entitled to audio content
AND I have a favorite team selected
AND I launch the app and select the Audio link on the Scoreboard
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN I will see a paywall with the options to buy MLB Audio
AND I will see the favorite team’s background image

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I am an Un-Entitled user
AND I am viewing the drawer
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I will see a “Subscribe to MLB Audio” as the first item in the menu (below drawer header)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN an in-app purchase has been made
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should see the Connect Account page

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN an anonymous user is on the connect page
AND the “Sign In with MLB” button is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is redirected to the Login page

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN an anonymous user is on the connect page
AND the “Don’t have an account? Sign Up” button is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is redirected to the Sign Up page

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN an anonymous user is on the connect page
AND the “Skip” button is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is directed to the expected post-paywall page

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN an anonymous user is on the connect page
AND the “More Info” button is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is shown the Subscription Management FAQ

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN an anonymous user is on the connect page
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user should see the color mode (light/dark) as set in the app settings

title: Sync IAP on Login
custom_preconds: GIVEN a google user with a store purchase

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN logging in during On Boarding
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN purchase is attached to the account

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN creating a new account
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the new account has the purchase entitlements

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the Subscriptions (See your subscriptions) link in Settings is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Subscriptions area of the Google Play Store opens (https://play.google.com/store/account/subscriptions)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the Check Subscription link at the bottom of the Video Paywall is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Subscriptions area of the Google Play Store opens (https://play.google.com/store/account/subscriptions)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the Check Subscription link at the bottom of the Audio Paywall is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Subscriptions area of the Google Play Store opens (https://play.google.com/store/account/subscriptions)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user has an existing anonymous subscription
AND the user upgrades to version 10.6.0.8 or higher
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will be presented with a screen that forces them to create an account or login before proceeding in the app

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN an anonymous user makes a purchase in the app
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will be presented with a screen that forces them to create an account or login before proceeding in the app

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN an anonymous user makes a purchase in the app
AND does not register or login
AND the user closes the app
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will be presented with a screen that forces them to create an account or login before proceeding in the app when returning to the app

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN an anonymous user is presented with the screen which forces them to create an account or login
AND the user logs in or creates an account
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will be navigated back into the app
AND the user will be granted proper entitlements(this can be checked in settings under username)
AND the user will be able to play media to which they are entitled

title: Initial Launch
custom_preconds:
Test for both Google Play Store and Amazon App Store
User is using a Google Play device with a valid Google Play account, for cases involving the Play Store

First launch - User has not yet launched the app or the user has cleared app data in device settings

custom_steps_separated.content:
On First Launch
When the splash screen has finished loaded
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the At Bat Pay Wall should load

custom_steps_separated.content:
On First Launch
When the Pay Wall loads
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user should see:

"At Bat"
"The Best Way to Watch and Listen to Live Baseball
Subscribe to At Bat Premium to follow your team live with audio, in-game highlights and more."

-'Explore Features' button that will take the user to a view listing At Bat Premium features
-Two 'Subscribe' buttons (Yearly, Monthly) with prices ($24.99, $2.99)
-'Sign in with MLB.com Account' button
-'skip' button
-'Restore Purchases' link

custom_steps_separated.content:
On First Launch
When the user taps the "skip" button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the pay wall should dismiss
And the user should be taken through the onboarding flow

custom_steps_separated.content:
On First Launch
When the user taps either one of the Purchase/Subscribe buttons
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the Play Store In-App Purchase flow should appear where the user can purchase or subscribe to the Full Version of At Bat

custom_steps_separated.content:
On First Launch
When the user taps the 'Having trouble with purchase' link
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user should be brought to an external web page where they can get more information and link to a web flow to purchase At Bat on the web

title: Sign in with MLB Account
custom_preconds: Given the user has launched the app for the first time

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user sees the At Bat paywall for the first time
and the user taps the 'Sign in With MLB Account' button
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user should be taken to the Login Screen

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user is taken to the Login screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user should see the following:

-field for Email
-field for Password
-Login button
-link to the Privacy Policy
-Forgot Password> link
-Help button

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user logs in with an MLB.TV Subscribed account
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user should have access to At Bat features and MLB.TV video streams

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user logs in with an MLB account with no purchases
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the pay wall should dismiss
And the user should be taken through the onboarding flow
And the user should be able to access all 'Full At Bat' features
And the user should NOT be able to access paid MLB.TV video streams

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user logs in with a Single Team Account
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the pay wall should dismiss
And the user should be able to access all 'Full At Bat' features
And the user should NOT be able to access paid MLB.TV video streams, EXCEPT for their single team's TV feed

title: Purchase Buttons & Play Store
custom_steps:
When the user launches the app for the first time
and is on the At Bat paywall

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user cannot access the Play Store
(not logged in to valid Play store account)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user should see an indication that there is a problem

title: Free, not logged-in user
custom_preconds:
Given user has already completed Initial Launch flow and has chosen to "Skip" from initial Pay Wall and is using app as a free, not logged-in user.

(Watch/Games page with MLB.TV Streams, accessible by tapping Video button in top right corner of app)

custom_steps_separated.content: user taps game tile for **live** MLB.TV stream from Watch
custom_steps_separated.expected: the user should be presented with the MLB.tv Pay Wall

custom_steps_separated.content: user taps game tile for **archive** MLB.TV stream from Watch
custom_steps_separated.expected: the user is presented with the MLB.tv Pay Wall

custom_steps_separated.content: user taps game tile for **live** MLB.TV Free Game of the Day stream from Watch
custom_steps_separated.expected:
the user should be presented with the message with 3 button selections below.

'Free Game of the Day:

The MLB Free Game of the Day is available to all users with a valid MLB.com account. Log into your account for access to this broadcast, or register for a free MLB.com account.

DISMISS              REGISTER LOGIN'

custom_steps_separated.content: user taps **archive** MLB.TV Game of the Day from Watch
custom_steps_separated.expected:
the user should be presented with the message with 3 button selections below.

'Free Game of the Day:

The MLB Free Game of the Day is available to all users with a valid MLB.com account. Log into your account for access to this broadcast, or register for a free MLB.com account.

DISMISS              REGISTER LOGIN'

custom_steps_separated.content: user taps MLB.TV button in score module of expanded scoreboard for live game
custom_steps_separated.expected: the user is presented with the MLB.TV Pay Wall

custom_steps_separated.content: user taps MLB.TV button in score module of team page for live game
custom_steps_separated.expected: the user is presented with the MLB.TV Pay Wall

custom_steps_separated.content: LITE user taps Audio button in Action Bar then selects a live or archive feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user should be presented with the audio Pay Wall

custom_steps_separated.content: LITE user taps Audio button in score module of team page
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user should be presented with the audio Pay Wall

custom_steps_separated.content: user taps Gameday button for live game from an expanded game cell on the scoreboard
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user should be taken into Gameday

custom_steps_separated.content: user taps Gameday button in Team Page score module for live game
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user should be taken into Gameday

custom_steps_separated.content: user taps Gameday Button from List view of the Schedules/Results section of the team page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user should be taken to the Live tab during a Live Game
And the user should be taken to the Preview/Wrap tab when the game is not live

custom_steps_separated.content: LITE user taps Gameday Button from Month view of the Schedules/Results section of the team page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user should be taken into Gameday
And the user should be taken to the Preview/Wrap tab when the game is not live

custom_steps_separated.content: user taps Live Look In stream from Watch
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user should be prompted with the At Bat Pay Wall

title: Free, logged-in user
custom_preconds: User logged in with an MLB account with no subscriptions

custom_steps_separated.content: user taps game tile for **live** game from Watch
custom_steps_separated.expected: the user is presented with the Pay Wall

custom_steps_separated.content: user taps game tile for **archive** game from Watch
custom_steps_separated.expected: the user is presented with the Pay Wall

custom_steps_separated.content: user taps game tile for **live** Free Game of the Day stream from Watch
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the stream should begin to play
And the user should NOT be prompted with a Pay Wall

custom_steps_separated.content: user taps game tile for **archive** Free Game of the Day stream from Watch
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the stream should begin to play
And the user should NOT be prompted with a Pay Wall

custom_steps_separated.content: user taps MLB.TV link from live game in scoreboard expanded view
custom_steps_separated.expected: the user is presented with the MLB.TV Pay Wall

custom_steps_separated.content: user taps MLB.TV link from scores section of live game in team page
custom_steps_separated.expected: the user is presented with the MLB.TV Pay Wall

custom_steps_separated.content: user taps audio link from live game in scoreboard expanded view
custom_steps_separated.expected: the user is presented with the audio Pay Wall

custom_steps_separated.content: user taps audio link from scores section of live game in team page
custom_steps_separated.expected: the user is presented with the audio Pay Wall

title: Accessing Full/Premium features
custom_preconds:
Cases assume user has already completed Initial Launch flow and has chosen to "Continue to Free App" from initial Pay Wall and is using app as Lite User. 

LITE user - User who is not logged in with entitled account or who has not purchased or restored In App Purchase
FULL user - User who is logged in with an MLB account
MLB.TV user - User who is logged in with account entitled with At Bat access AND MLB.TV access. (MLB.TV premium contains At Bat entitlement)

Full At Bat feature - Gated feature that is NOT MLB.TV live game or archive (eg. Gameday Audio, Pitch by Pitch Gameday)

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on the 'Explore Features' link on the At Bat Paywall
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user should see the MLB.TV feature screen describing subscribe, listen, access and follow

custom_steps_separated.content: User dismisses Pay Wall by tapping 'Up' button on Pay Wall or device Back button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the Pay Wall should dismiss
And the user should remain in the Lite version of the app 
(Verify the user cannot access premium features)

custom_steps_separated.content: LITE user who has opened Pay Wall taps the 'Buy' or 'Subscribe' button
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the Play Store flow should appear where the user can unlock the full version of the app

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps the 'Log In' link on the Pay Wall
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user should be prompted with a log in screen
And there should be a field for Username
And there should be a field for Password
And there should be a Login button

custom_steps_separated.content: LITE user logs in with entitled MLB.TV account from At Bat Paywall
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the pay wall should dismiss
And the user should see a 'toast' message indicating to the user that they are signed in and have unlocked all At Bat features
And the user should be brought into the full version of the app
And the user should be able to access all Full At Bat features
And the user should be able to access paid MLB.TV video streams

custom_steps_separated.content:
LITE user logs in with entitled Single Team account from At Bat Paywall
when trying to access Audio
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the paywall should dismiss
And the user should be brought to the Audio EPG
And the user should be able to access their Single Team's audio feed
And see a "This feed is not included in your subscription" message in the audio player when trying to access any other team's audio feed

custom_steps_separated.content:
LITE user logs in with entitled Single Team account from At Bat Paywall
when trying to launch the MLB.TV Game of the Day
and their Single Team is one of the teams playing
and the user taps that team's feed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the paywall should dismiss
And the feed should begin to play

custom_steps_separated.content: LITE user logs in with a non entitled BAMNET account from At Bat Paywall
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user should receive a message indicating that this account is not entitled for At Bat access
And the user should be brought back to the Pay Wall
And the user should be signed in to their MLB account
And the 'Sign In' button on the feature gate will now say "Sign in with another MLB account"
And the user should not have access to At Bat

custom_steps_separated.content: LITE user logs in with entitled At Bat Premium account from At Bat Paywall
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the Pay Wall should dismiss
And the user should see a 'toast' message indicating to the user that they are signed in and have unlocked all At Bat features
And the user should be brought into the full version of the app
And the user should be able to access all Full At Bat features
And the user should NOT be able to access MLB.tv paid feeds

custom_steps_separated.content: LITE user logs in with entitled Single Team + Android At Bat account from At Bat Paywall
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the Pay Wall should dismiss
And the user should see a 'toast' message indicating to the user that they are signed in and have unlocked all At Bat features
And the user should be brought into the full version of the app
And the user should be able to access all Full At Bat features
And the user should NOT be able to access MLB.tv paid feeds
EXCEPT for their Single Team's TV feed

custom_steps_separated.content: LITE user logs in with entitled MLB.TV account from MLB.TV paywall
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the Pay Wall should dismiss
And the user should see a 'toast' message indicating to the user that they are signed in and have unlocked all At Bat features
And the user should be taken into the MLB.tv player where the video stream should begin playing

custom_steps_separated.content: LITE user purchases or subscribes to At Bat from Pay Wall
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the Pay Wall should dismiss
And the user should see a 'toast' message indicating to the user that they are signed in and have unlocked all At Bat features
And the user should be taken into the feature they were attempting to access

custom_steps_separated.content: LITE user restores purchase from At Bat Pay Wall
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the Pay Wall should dismiss
And the user should see a 'toast' message indicating to the user that they are signed in and have unlocked all At Bat features
And the user should be taken into the feature they were attempting to access

custom_steps_separated.content: LITE user logs into entitled account via app settings page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user should see a 'toast' message indicating to the user that they are signed in with an At Bat account 
And the user should be able to access At Bat features without issue
And the user should NOT be able to access MLB.TV streams

custom_steps_separated.content: FULL user loses entitlement, attempts to access At Bat feature
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then user should be presented with the At Bat Pay Wall

custom_steps_separated.content:
MLB.TV user watching live MLB.TV stream loses entitlement 
(Cancelled in Rodeo)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user should not be removed from the live video stream
And the next time the user attempts to launch an MLB.TV stream or other premium feature, they should be prompted with the pay wall

custom_steps_separated.content:
FULL user viewing At Bat features (Gameday, Gameday Audio) loses entitlement
(Cancelled in Rodeo)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user should not be removed from the feature 
And the next time they attempt to launch an At Bat Feature, they should be brought to the pay wall

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user logged into a BAMNET account linked to an In App Purchase (BAMNET1)
And the purchase is linked to a different BAMNET account (BAMNET2)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user logged in with the original BAMNET account (BAMNET1) should eventually be blocked from accessing At Bat features

title: App searches for Purchase upon initial launch of the app
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has initially launched the app
custom_steps: WHEN the user passes the splash screen
custom_expected: THEN the app with automatically search to restore any previous purchase the Google user has made

title: Purchase is restored automatically upon initial launch of app if google account has previous purchase
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has previously made in app purchases
AND the user has initially launches the app
custom_steps: WHEN the app searches for previously purchases
custom_expected: THEN the purchases are automatically restored

title: Purchase is not restored if user has not made any previous purchase
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has NOT previously made in app purchases
AND the user has initially launches the app
custom_steps: WHEN the app searches for previously purchases
custom_expected:
THEN the not purchases are restored
AND the user is presented with the paywall

title: Purchase is linked if user has made a subscribe and install purchase directly from Google Play
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has previously made the subscribe and install purchase directly from Google Play Store
AND the user has initially launches the app
custom_steps: WHEN the app searches for previously purchases
custom_expected: THEN the purchases are automatically restored

title: Purchase is linked if user has made a purchase in Device A and launched app initially in device B
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has previously made in app purchases in device A
AND the user has initially launches the app on device B
custom_steps: WHEN the app searches for previously purchases
custom_expected: THEN the purchases are automatically restored

title: User who has previously made a purchase is NOT shown the paywall after auto linking occurs after initial launch
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has previously made an At Bat/MLB.TV purchase
custom_steps: WHEN the user initially launched the app
custom_expected:
THEN is taken directly to account linking screen and team picker after purchase is auto linked 
AND the user is not shown the paywall

title: User is shown a toast identifying that a subscription has been detected and features are now restored
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has previously made an At Bat/MLB.TV purchase
AND the user initially launched the app
custom_steps: WHEN the purchase is automatically restored
custom_expected: THEN the user is presented a toast message which indicate that subscription was detected and restored

title: Previously purchased features are available once user enters the app
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has previously made an At Bat/MLB.TV purchase
AND the user initially launched the app
custom_steps:
WHEN the auto restore is complete
AND on boarding is complete
custom_expected: THEN the features previously purchased are accessible
